body:
Hi Radiance experts,
I'm conducting an experiment on evaluation of different algorithms to light
and colour analysis on materials. Previously we've only analyzed on
real-world scenes. And we're looking for to do some experiments on
simulation scenes and we figured pictures generated by radiance using light
simulation would be perfect. Currently the scenes I'm using are from the
tutorials of Rendering with Radiance. I'm wondering if there are any public
available datasets of built radiance models such as tables, windows,
chairs... that I could use? Thank you very much for taking a look!


Best,
Vera
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2014-May/010279.html).</sup>
